summary: Small mod to cover-up the Down-scale of size when a female draws a weapon.
descriptionHtml:
= INFORMATION =
It's been driving me nuts that my female character's great sword shrinks when she draws it, and grows when she puts it on her back. So here is a small mod to cover-up that up (or make it less obvious, at least), for anyone else who is annoyed by this.

I tried to adjust the drawn weapon to be exactly the same as the sheathed version. However, i have no clue what the actual scale value is. So it's a ball-park, and i suck at judging this stuff........... So if you think it needs to be adjusted comment/message me, yeah? Right now it is sitting at 1.18x it's normal drawn size for 2-handed weapons, and 1.25x for one-handed.

- Works for all weapons.

- This mod is still new and in beta, so let me know if you run into any problems. I greatly appreciate bug reports, or even just constructive criticism.

- Don't forget to endorse if you like it ^^



= REQUIREMENTS =
- SKSE 1.6+


= UPDATE LOG =
0.1b - Initial Release. Only affects 2-hand melee weapons
0.2b - Now works for the above, as well as bows and one-handed melee weapons (both left and right).



= INSTALL =
- Download and extract to your skyrim folder.


= UPDATE =
- Just over-write the existing install, that's it.



= FUTURE =
- Alternate version to downscale weapon on back to match drawn size.
- Alternate version to affect all female NPCs.
- User suggestions welcome.



= KNOWN ISSUES =
- May not work the first time you load. Save your game, reload, and you should be okay. (Trying to find a work around.)
author: antcryst
